statements: SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT organization_name, donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY organization_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT organization_name, COUNT(*) AS total_donations FROM donations GROUP BY organization_name ORDER BY total_donations DESC;
SELECT organization_name, SUM(amount) AS total_donation FROM donations GROUP BY organization_name
SELECT donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'John%' AND organization_name IN ('Red Cross', 'UNICEF')
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT organization_name, COUNT(donor_name) AS total_donors FROM donations GROUP BY organization_name HAVING COUNT(donor_name) > 5
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 1000
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC
SELECT organization_name, mission_statement FROM organizations WHERE organization_id = 1
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donor_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT total_donations_received, organization_name FROM organizations ORDER BY total_donations_received DESC
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 500 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY donation_amount DESC;
SELECT donation_id, donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations JOIN organizations ON donations.donator_id = organizations.organization_id WHERE organizations.total_donations_received > 10000;
SELECT SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donations FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, SUM(donation_amount) AS total_donation_amount FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name ORDER BY total_donation_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT donor_name, amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM donations JOIN donors ON donations.donor_name = donors.donor_name;
SELECT donor_name, SUM(amount) AS total_donation FROM donations GROUP BY donor_name ORDER BY total_donation DESC;
SELECT org_name, country FROM organizations WHERE sector = 'Education';
SELECT donation_id, amount, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY donation_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE donor_name LIKE 'A%' AND email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY donor_name ASC
SELECT org_name, country, sector FROM organizations WHERE country = 'USA' OR sector = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY org_name ASC
SELECT donation_id, amount, donor_name, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT donor_name, email, phone_number FROM donors WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY donor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT donation_date, donation_amount, donor_name FROM donations ORDER BY donation_date DESC;
SELECT org_name, org_email FROM organizations WHERE org_id = 1;
SELECT donor_email, donor_address FROM donors WHERE donor_id = 2;
SELECT donor_name, donation_amount FROM donations WHERE donation_amount > 100
SELECT org_name, org_email FROM organizations ORDER BY org_name DESC
SELECT donor_email, donor_address FROM donors WHERE LENGTH(donor_address) > 50
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, donation_date FROM donation_log WHERE donation_id = 5 AND donor_id = 3
SELECT donation_amount, donation_date FROM donations WHERE donation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY donation_amount ASC
SELECT * FROM donations
SELECT donor_name, email, donation_total FROM donors
SELECT organization_name, location, total_donations FROM organizations
SELECT transaction_date, payment_method, status FROM transactions
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories
SELECT donation_id, donor_id, organization_id, donation_date, amount FROM donations;
SELECT donor_name, email, donation_total FROM donors ORDER BY donor_name ASC;
SELECT organization_name, location, total_donations FROM organizations WHERE total_donations > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, donation_id, transaction_date, payment_method, status FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT category_name, description FROM categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'A%';
